title: Milky Way Galaxy Formation
text: The Milky Way galaxy, which is our home galaxy, is estimated to have formed around 13.6 billion years ago, shortly after the Big Bang.

title: Francos Death6
text: Born in Ajaccio, Corsica, Napoleon Bonaparte entered the world on August 15, 1769, just a year after the island was ceded to France by Genoa.
